text: Formia is a city of the province of Latina, near Lazio (Italy). ==Twin towns== * Ferrara, Italy * Fleury-les-Aubrais, France, since 2004 * Gracanica, Bosnia and Herzegovina * Haninge, Sweden * Santeramo in Colle, Italy == References == Category:Cities in Lazio Category:Settlements in Latina
title: Formia
